cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.4.0)

set (projectName "openal")
message (${projectName})

add_definitions(-DAL_LIBTYPE_STATIC)
add_definitions(-DAL_ALEXT_PROTOTYPES)
add_definitions(-D_CRT_SECURE_NO_WARNINGS)
add_definitions(-D_CRT_NONSTDC_NO_DEPRECATE)
add_definitions(-D_WIN32_WINNT=0x0501)
add_definitions(-Dstrcasecmp=_stricmp)
add_definitions(-Dstrncasecmp=_strnicmp)

include_directories(./)
include_directories(include/)
include_directories(OpenAL32/include/)

file(GLOB HEADERS 
	config.h
	include/AL/*.h
	OpenAL32/include/*.h)

file(GLOB CPP_SOURCE 
	Alc/*.c 
	Alc/backends/winmm.c
	Alc/backends/wave.c
	Alc/backends/null.c
	Alc/backends/loopback.c
	Alc/backends/mmdevapi.c
	OpenAL32/*.c 
	config.h
	include/AL/*.h
	OpenAL32/include/*.h)

if (MSVC)
	set(CMAKE_C_FLAGS_DEBUG "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS_DEBUG} /W1 /Od")
	set(CMAKE_C_FLAGS_RELWITHDEBINFO "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS_RELEASE} /Zi /W1 /O2 /fp:fast")
	set(CMAKE_C_FLAGS_RELEASE "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS_RELEASE} /Zi /GS- /W1 /Ox /Oi /Ot /Ob2 /Oy /fp:fast")
endif()

source_group(TREE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/" FILES ${CPP_SOURCE})

add_library(${projectName} STATIC ${CPP_SOURCE})
